players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Charlie has been investigating and I am the mafioso. Stay cautious."

Bob: "I am a villager and innocent.
"
You: remained silent.
You: "Be careful, Charlie has identified me as the mafioso. I will continue to protect the other mafia members and eliminate any threat to our group."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I know Alice is the mafioso. I will continue to investigate and protect the villagers. Be cautious, Alice."
Bob: "Let's work together to uncover the truth and protect the village. I will continue to support Charlie in his investigation and keep an eye out for any suspicious activities from Alice."

Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Alice was arrested
